title: Product Hunt Today Popular
description: Product Hunt Today Popular - Powered by RSSHub

items.title: LambdaTest Accessibility Testing Suite
items.content: LambdaTest's Accessibility Testing Suite automatically identifies WCAG compliance issues across your website and web app. Set scheduled scans, monitor in real-time, and implement fixes with guided recommendations, ensuring web inclusivity in just a few clicks!
items.contentSnippet: LambdaTest's Accessibility Testing Suite automatically identifies WCAG compliance issues across your website and web app. Set scheduled scans, monitor in real-time, and implement fixes with guided recommendations, ensuring web inclusivity in just a few clicks!
items.creator: Rohan Chaubey
items.summary: LambdaTest可访问性测试套件可自动识别网站和Web应用的WCAG合规性问题。支持设置定时扫描、实时监控，并提供指导性建议以快速修复问题，确保网站包容性。

items.title: Genspark Super Agent
items.content: Genspark Super Agent handles your everyday tasks, from making phone calls and generating slides to creating TikTok reels. With over 80 pre-built tools and extensive datasets, Genspark Super Agent is faster, more reliable, and more steerable.
items.contentSnippet: Genspark Super Agent handles your everyday tasks, from making phone calls and generating slides to creating TikTok reels. With over 80 pre-built tools and extensive datasets, Genspark Super Agent is faster, more reliable, and more steerable.
items.creator: Ben Lang
items.summary: Genspark Super Agent是一款智能助手，可处理日常任务，如打电话、制作幻灯片和创作抖音短视频。它拥有80多种预构建工具和海量数据集，运行更快、更可靠且可控性更强。

items.title: GPT Image API
items.content: OpenAI Image API now features gpt-image-1! Get GPT-4o level quality for image generation & advanced editing (multi-ref images, inpainting). Better instruction following & text rendering.
items.contentSnippet: OpenAI Image API now features gpt-image-1! Get GPT-4o level quality for image generation & advanced editing (multi-ref images, inpainting). Better instruction following & text rendering.
items.creator: Zac Zuo
items.summary: OpenAI Image API推出gpt-image-1功能，提供GPT-4o级别的图像生成与高级编辑能力，支持多参考图像和图像修复。改进了指令理解和文本渲染效果。

items.title: text.ai
items.content: You can now literally text AI. No downloads needed. text.ai simply joins your existing chats to help with plans, recommendations, & answers. Just add text.ai to any chat & get instant help without switching apps. Including group chats. Backed by YC (x25)
items.contentSnippet:
You can now literally text AI. No downloads needed. text.ai simply joins your existing chats to help with plans, recommendations, & answers. 

Just add text.ai to any chat & get instant help without switching apps. Including group chats. Backed by YC (x25)
items.creator: Garry Tan
items.summary: text.ai是一款无需下载的AI聊天助手，可直接加入现有聊天，提供计划、建议和答案。用户只需添加text.ai到任何聊天（包括群聊）即可即时获得帮助，无需切换应用。该产品由YC（x25）支持。

items.title: A-Leads
items.content: Tired of bad data and bloated tools? A-Leads delivers verified B2B emails and phone numbers with zero fluff—no bounces, no dead leads. Expect higher phone connection rates, cleaner outreach, and data that’s built to close.
items.contentSnippet: Tired of bad data and bloated tools? A-Leads delivers verified B2B emails and phone numbers with zero fluff—no bounces, no dead leads. Expect higher phone connection rates, cleaner outreach, and data that’s built to close.
items.creator: Denniz Ozden
items.summary: A-Leads提供经过验证的B2B邮箱和电话号码，无冗余数据，确保零退订、零无效线索。其服务有助于提高电话接通率，实现更精准的拓展，并提供高质量数据以促成交易。

items.title: Droppable - Messenger for large files
items.content: Droppable is a friendly little app for sending large files. Transfer raw photos and videos without losing quality or large file collections of up to 2TB straight from your Mac Desktop. Set expiry dates, add notes, and send to single recipients or groups.
items.contentSnippet: Droppable is a friendly little app for sending large files. Transfer raw photos and videos without losing quality or large file collections of up to 2TB straight from your Mac Desktop. Set expiry dates, add notes, and send to single recipients or groups.
items.creator: Gabe Perez
items.summary: Droppable是一款用于发送大文件的应用程序。用户可直接从Mac桌面传输原始照片、视频，无需损失质量，支持发送高达2TB的大文件集合。该应用允许设置文件过期日期、添加备注，并可将文件发送给单个收件人或群组。

items.title: Hana by Spline
items.content: Hana presents a new approach for interactive design. Built from scratch with performance at its core, Hana is a real-time canvas to design and animate interactive 2D experiences — from polished interfaces to dynamic visuals, and deliver to production.
items.contentSnippet: Hana presents a new approach for interactive design. Built from scratch with performance at its core, Hana is a real-time canvas to design and animate interactive 2D experiences — from polished interfaces to dynamic visuals, and deliver to production.
items.creator: Ankit Sharma
items.summary: Hana by Spline是一款专注于性能的交互式设计工具，提供了一个实时画布，用于设计和动画化2D交互体验，涵盖精致界面到动态视觉效果，并能直接交付生产。

items.title: PageTest.AI
items.content: PageTest.AI helps you A/B and multivariate test your website content using AI. Easily test headlines, CTAs, button text and copy—no code needed. Let AI suggest winning variants and track what converts. Free forever with 10,000 test impressions/month.
items.contentSnippet:
PageTest.AI helps you A/B and multivariate test your website content using AI. Easily test headlines, CTAs, button text and copy—no code needed. 

Let AI suggest winning variants and track what converts. Free forever with 10,000 test impressions/month.
items.creator: Ian Naylor
items.summary: PageTest.AI是一款利用AI进行A/B和多变量测试的网站内容测试工具。用户无需编程即可轻松测试标题、CTA、按钮文本和文案。该工具能自动推荐表现优异的版本并追踪转化效果，每月提供10,000次免费测试机会。

items.title: Linda AI
items.content: Linda is your personal interviewer & podcast host, guiding you through personalized interviews and transforming your conversations into short, shareable, professional-grade podcast episodes. No tech skills needed - just talk, and she'll take care of the rest.
items.contentSnippet: Linda is your personal interviewer & podcast host, guiding you through personalized interviews and transforming your conversations into short, shareable, professional-grade podcast episodes. No tech skills needed - just talk, and she'll take care of the rest.
items.creator: Nick Hasty
items.summary: Linda AI是一款个人访谈与播客主持工具，可引导用户进行个性化访谈，并将对话转化为专业级的短播客节目。无需技术技能，用户只需交谈，Linda将自动完成后续工作。

items.title: Recce
items.content: Recce helps data teams discover actual data impact and turn insight into actionable checklists for dbt pull request reviews. It’s a practical way to implement data best practices - know what’s changing, understand the impact, and merge with clarity.
items.contentSnippet: Recce helps data teams discover actual data impact and turn insight into actionable checklists for dbt pull request reviews. It’s a practical way to implement data best practices - know what’s changing, understand the impact, and merge with clarity.
items.creator: CL Kao
items.summary: Recce是一款帮助数据团队发现实际数据影响，并将洞察转化为可操作检查清单的工具，用于dbt pull request审查。它提供了一种实用的方法来实施数据最佳实践，通过了解变更内容、理解影响，实现清晰合并。

items.title: Detail 5
items.content: Create instant talking videos and video podcasts with our new AI-powered Auto Edit.<br><br>With the new AI Director in the teleprompter, you can brainstorm new video ideas or record a video with the help of your personal video assistant.
items.contentSnippet:
Create instant talking videos and video podcasts with our new AI-powered Auto Edit.

With the new AI Director in the teleprompter, you can brainstorm new video ideas or record a video with the help of your personal video assistant.
items.creator: Chris Messina
items.summary: 我们的新AI自动剪辑功能可快速制作谈话视频和视频播客。AI导演功能集成在提词器中，用户可借助个人视频助手进行视频创意构思或录制。

items.title: ContextGem
items.content: ContextGem is a free, open-source LLM framework that makes it radically easier to extract structured data and insights from documents — with minimal code.
items.contentSnippet: ContextGem is a free, open-source LLM framework that makes it radically easier to extract structured data and insights from documents — with minimal code.
items.creator: Sergii Shcherbak
items.summary: ContextGem是一个免费、开源的大型语言模型框架，能够通过极少的代码从文档中高效提取结构化数据和洞察。该框架简化了数据处理流程，提升了信息获取效率。

items.title: Emotly
items.content: Unlock deeper emotional awareness with Emotly. Rate your feelings in a few easy taps, visualize patterns, practice gratitude, & identify triggers. Understand your best/worst days to boost well-being. Quick entries, powerful insights. Private & secure.
items.contentSnippet: Unlock deeper emotional awareness with Emotly. Rate your feelings in a few easy taps, visualize patterns, practice gratitude, & identify triggers. Understand your best/worst days to boost well-being. Quick entries, powerful insights. Private & secure.
items.creator: Vlad
items.summary: Emotly是一款帮助用户提升情绪感知的应用。通过简单操作记录感受、可视化情绪模式、练习感恩和识别触发因素，用户能了解自身情绪变化规律，优化情绪状态。应用支持快速记录、提供深度洞察，并确保用户数据私密安全。

items.title: Listen Labs
items.content: Listen Labs conducts customer interviews for you and summarizes responses into insightful and actionable reports.
items.contentSnippet: Listen Labs conducts customer interviews for you and summarizes responses into insightful and actionable reports.
items.creator: Chris Messina
items.summary: Listen Labs提供客户访谈服务，将访谈内容总结为具有洞察力和可操作性的报告。

items.title: Supajar
items.content: Supajar helps you search, analyze, and export YouTube comments using AI. Discover trends, filter by relevance, and export insights to CSV — perfect for creators, marketers, and researchers. Available as a Chrome Extension and web app.
items.contentSnippet: Supajar helps you search, analyze, and export YouTube comments using AI. Discover trends, filter by relevance, and export insights to CSV — perfect for creators, marketers, and researchers. Available as a Chrome Extension and web app.
items.creator: Ivan Oliinyk
items.summary: Supajar是一款利用AI技术帮助用户搜索、分析和导出YouTube评论的工具。它支持发现趋势、按相关性筛选，并能将洞察导出为CSV格式，适用于创作者、营销人员和研究人员。该工具提供Chrome扩展和网页应用两种版本。

items.title: AvatarFX by Character.AI
items.content: AvatarFX by Character.AI is the new AI model brings images to life. Animates characters/photos into realistic videos that speak, sing & emote with consistent movement.
items.contentSnippet: AvatarFX by Character.AI is the new AI model brings images to life. Animates characters/photos into realistic videos that speak, sing & emote with consistent movement.
items.creator: Zac Zuo
items.summary: AvatarFX by Character.AI是一款新的AI模型，能够将图像生动化。它可以将角色或照片制作成逼真的视频，视频中的人物可以说话、唱歌、表达情感，并保持动作的一致性。

items.title: Truely by Validia
items.content: Suspect candidates are leveraging AI during your interviews? Our cutting-edge tool identifies AI usage as it happens. Simply have candidates download our lightweight application before your interview begins, and gain instant visibility into authenticity.
items.contentSnippet: Suspect candidates are leveraging AI during your interviews? Our cutting-edge tool identifies AI usage as it happens. Simply have candidates download our lightweight application before your interview begins, and gain instant visibility into authenticity.
items.creator: Paul Vann
items.summary: Truely by Validia是一款创新工具，可在面试过程中识别候选人是否使用AI。候选人需在面试前下载轻量级应用，即可实时检测其真实性，确保面试的公平性和有效性。

items.title: Gutenberg Books EPUB Search
items.content: A simple way to browse and search Project Gutenberg for EPUB files that you can then download and use in your favorite e-reader.
items.contentSnippet: A simple way to browse and search Project Gutenberg for EPUB files that you can then download and use in your favorite e-reader.
items.creator: Thomas Schranz ⛄️
items.summary: Gutenberg Books EPUB搜索工具提供了一种便捷方式，用于浏览和搜索Project Gutenberg项目中的EPUB文件，用户可下载并在常用电子阅读器中使用。

items.title: Subtiled.com
items.content: Browser-based subtitle editor that leverages AI to generate captions with up to 97% accuracy in seconds. It accepts remote and local files in formats like YouTube, MP4 and MP3. Once generated, subtitles can be translated into over 30 languages.
items.contentSnippet: Browser-based subtitle editor that leverages AI to generate captions with up to 97% accuracy in seconds. It accepts remote and local files in formats like YouTube, MP4 and MP3. Once generated, subtitles can be translated into over 30 languages.
items.creator: Marcin Wawrzosek
items.summary: Subtiled.com是一款基于浏览器的AI字幕编辑器，可在数秒内生成准确率达97%的字幕。支持导入YouTube、MP4、MP3等远程和本地文件，并能将字幕翻译成30多种语言。

items.title: Snips by Aloha Browser
items.content: Snips cut through web clutter, freeing up time and mental space. It proactively monitors web updates, chosen by you, in background, offering a convenient, instantly updated dashboard of all things that matter most, and alerts only when there’s something new.
items.contentSnippet: Snips cut through web clutter, freeing up time and mental space. It proactively monitors web updates, chosen by you, in background, offering a convenient, instantly updated dashboard of all things that matter most, and alerts only when there’s something new.
items.creator: Aloha Browser
items.summary: Snips by Aloha Browser是一款浏览器工具，旨在简化网络信息，节省用户的时间和精力。它能在后台主动监控用户选定网页的更新，提供即时更新的重要信息面板，并在有新内容时发出提醒。
